(ROOT
  (ADVP (RB Back)
    (PP (IN in)
      (NP (CD 2009)))))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBD wrote)
      (PP (IN about)
        (NP
          (NP (NNP Cacio) (NNP e) (NNP Pepe))
          (SBAR
            (WHNP (WDT which))
            (S
              (VP (VBD was)
                (NP
                  (NP (DT a) (NN story))
                  (PP (IN about)
                    (NP
                      (NP (DT an) (JJ Italian) (NN restaurant))
                      (PP (IN in)
                        (NP
                          (NP (DT an) (`` ``) (NNP Ulu) ('' '')
                            (PRN (-LRB- -LRB-)
                              (NP (JJ remote))
                              (-RRB- -RRB-))
                            (NN location))
                          (VP (VBG serving)
                            (NP
                              (ADJP (RB pretty) (JJ decent))
                              (JJ Italian) (NN food))))))))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(wrote-2, I-1)
root(ROOT-0, wrote-2)
prep(wrote-2, about-3)
nn(Pepe-6, Cacio-4)
nn(Pepe-6, e-5)
pobj(about-3, Pepe-6)

cop(story-10, was-8)
det(story-10, a-9)
rcmod(Pepe-6, story-10)
prep(story-10, about-11)
det(restaurant-14, an-12)
amod(restaurant-14, Italian-13)
pobj(about-11, restaurant-14)
prep(restaurant-14, in-15)
det(location-23, an-16)
nn(location-23, Ulu-18)
dep(location-23, remote-21)
pobj(in-15, location-23)
partmod(location-23, serving-24)
advmod(decent-26, pretty-25)
amod(food-28, decent-26)
amod(food-28, Italian-27)
dobj(serving-24, food-28)

          (PP (TO to)

              (NP (RB yet) (DT another) (NN ulu) (NN location))

                    (NP (DT the) (NN island)))))))

              (NP (JJ last) (NN I))

  (S
    (NP (NNP Chef) (NNP Peter))
    (VP
      (VP (VBZ has)
        (VP (VBN been)
          (VP (VBG cooking)
            (NP (JJ Italian) (NN food))
            (PP (IN since)
              (NP (DT the) (NNS nineties))))))
      (CC and)
      (VP (VBD was)
        (NP
          (NP (CD one))
          (PP (IN of)

              (NP (DT the) (NN pioneer) (NNS chefs))
              (PP (IN of)
                (NP (JJ Italian) (NN cuisine))))))

          (NP (DT the) (NNS days))))

          (NP (EX there))

            (ADVP (RB only))

    (. !)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (DT The) (NN location))
      (PP (IN of)
        (NP
          (NP (DT these) (NNS restaurants))
          (PP
            (PP (IN outside)
              (PP (IN of)
                (NP (DT the) (NNP CBD) (NN area))))
            (CC and)
            (PP (IN within)
              (NP (JJ residential) (NNS estates)))))))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (ADVP
        (NP (DT a) (RB lot))
        (RBR more))
      (ADJP (NN family) (JJ friendly))
      (SBAR (IN as)
        (S
          (S
            (NP (PRP we))
            (VP (VBP do) (RB n't)
              (VP (VB have)
                (S
                  (VP (TO to)
                    (VP (VB travel)
                      (NP (PDT all) (DT the) (NN way))
                      (PP (IN into)
                        (NP (NN town)))))))))
          (CC and)
          (S
            (NP (DT the) (NN patrons))
            (ADVP (RB also))
            (VP (VBP tend)
              (S
                (VP (TO to)
                  (VP (VB be)
                    (VP (VBN extended)
                      (NP
                        (NP (NNS families))
                        (VP (VBG having)
                          (NP (DT a) (NN meal))))))))))
          (ADVP (RB together)))))
    (. .)))

  (S (IN So)
    (NP (EX there))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (NP

        (PP (IN of)
          (NP
            (NP
              (QP (RB around) (CD 10) (TO to) (CD 15))
              (NNS minutes))
            (PP (IN for)
              (NP (DT the) (NNS pastas))))))
      (SBAR (IN as)
        (S
          (NP (DT the) (JJ dried) (NNS pastas))
          (VP (VBP require)
            (NP
              (QP (IN at) (JJS least) (CD 8))
              (NNS minutes))

              (VP (TO to)
                (VP (VB cook)
                  (SBAR (IN before)
                    (S
                      (NP (PRP he))
                      (VP (VBZ assembles)

    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S (CC but)
    (ADVP (RB now))
    (NP (PRP he))
    (VP
      (VP (VBZ has)
        (VP (VBN gone)
          (ADVP
            (NP (CD one))
            (RB up))))
      (CC and)
      (VP (VBD added)
        (NP (NN rum))
        (PP (IN into)
          (NP
            (NP (DT the) (NN chocolate))
            (SBAR
              (WHNP (WDT which))
              (S
                (VP (VBZ makes)
                  (S
                    (NP (PRP it))
                    (ADJP (RB even) (RBR more) (JJ delightful))))))))))
    (. !)))


cc(gone-5, but-1)
advmod(gone-5, now-2)
nsubj(gone-5, he-3)
aux(gone-5, has-4)
root(ROOT-0, gone-5)
npadvmod(up-7, one-6)
advmod(gone-5, up-7)
cc(gone-5, and-8)
conj(gone-5, added-9)
dobj(added-9, rum-10)
prep(added-9, into-11)
det(chocolate-13, the-12)
pobj(into-11, chocolate-13)
nsubj(makes-15, which-14)
rcmod(chocolate-13, makes-15)
nsubj(delightful-19, it-16)
advmod(delightful-19, even-17)
advmod(delightful-19, more-18)
xcomp(makes-15, delightful-19)


(ROOT
  (S
    (VP (VBN Conclusion)
      (NP
        (NP (PRP$ Its)
          (ADJP
            (ADJP (JJ great)
              (S
                (VP (TO to)
                  (VP (VB see)
                    (NP (JJ authentic) (JJ Italian) (NN food))
                    (PP (IN in)
                      (NP (DT these) (JJ remote) (NNS places)))))))
            (CC and)
            (ADJP (RB especially) (JJ good)))
          (NN news))
        (PP (IN for)
          (NP
            (NP (NNS people))
            (SBAR
              (WHNP (WP who))
              (S
                (VP (VBP live)
                  (PP (IN in)
                    (NP
                      (NP (DT the) (NNP North) (NNP East) (NN region))
                      (PP (IN of)
                        (NP (NNP Singapore)))))
                  (SBAR (IN as)
                    (S
                      (NP (PRP you))
                      (VP (VBP do) (RB n't)
                        (VP (VB have)
                          (S
                            (VP (TO to)
                              (VP (VB head)
                                (NP (PDT all) (DT the) (NN way))
                                (PP (IN down)
                                  (NP (NN town))))))))))))))))
      (S
        (VP (TO to)
          (VP (VB get)
            (NP (PRP$ your) (NN pasta)
              (CC and)
              (NN pizza) (NN fix))))))
    (. .)))

    (VP (VBP check)
      (PRT (RP out))
      (NP (PRP$ their)
        (NX
          (NP (CD 1))
          (PP (IN for)
            (NP (CD 1) (NN lunch) (NNS deals)))))
      (PP (IN from)
        (NP (NNP Mondays)))
      (PP (TO to)
        (NP (NNS Fridays))))
    (. .)))

  (NP
    (S
      (S
        (NP
          (NP
            (QP (RB About) (PDT half)))
          (PP (IN of)
            (NP
              (NP (DT the) (NNS pizzas)
                (CC and)
                (NNS pastas))
              (PP (IN on)
                (NP (DT the) (NN menu))))))
        (VP (VBP are)
          (PP (IN on)
            (NP (JJ special)))))
      (CC and)
      (S
        (NP (PRP it))
        (VP (VBZ works)
          (PRT (RP out))
          (S
            (VP (TO to)
              (VP (VB be)
                (VP
                  (ADVP (RB around))
                  (VBN $))))))))))

  (S

          (VP (VB drop)

              (PP (IN for)
                (NP (NN lunch))))

              (S
                (NP (PRP you))
                (VP (VBP are)
                  (VP (VBG working)
                    (PP (IN around)
                      (NP (DT the) (NN area)))))))))))
    (. !)))

(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (ADJP (JJ 6pm)
      (PP (TO to)
        (NP (CD 11pm))))
    (S
      (VP (VB Open)
        (NP (JJ daily) (JJ Many) (NNS thanks))
        (PP (TO to)
          (NP
            (NP (NNP Chef) (NNP Peter))
            (PP (IN for)
              (S
                (VP (VBG hosting)
                  (NP (PRP$ our) (NN meal)))))))))))

pobj(to-2, 11pm-3)
